member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Checks whether a user with the provided username already exists.

member.summary: Checks whether a user with the provided email already exists.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.Azure.AzureProvider.LoginWithFacebook(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for authenticating a user with a Facebook account.
member.param: The token provided by the Facbook OAuth SDK after a successful login.
member.returns: An instance of the enum determining the result of the login operation.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.Azure.AzureProvider.LoginWithGoogle(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for authenticating a user with a Google account.
member.param: The token provided by the Google OAuth SDK after a successful login.
member.returns: An instance of the enum determining the result of the login operation.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.Azure.AzureProvider.LoginWithLiveId(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for authenticating a user with a LiveID account.
member.param: The token provided by the LiveID OAuth SDK after a successful login.
member.returns: An instance of the enum determining the result of the login operation.

member.summary: Performs a login operation with the provided username and password.

member.summary: Loads the application settings saved by the currently logged user. If there are no settings saved by the currently logged user or if there is no user logged the default settings are loaded.
